0.text: EFFECT RADIUS: 300

Innate: Whenever Sylas casts an ability, he generate a stack of Unshackled for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent casts and stacking up to 3 times. While Sylas has stacks, he gains  125% bonus attack speed.
0.html: Innate: Whenever Sylas casts an ability, he generate a stack of Unshackled for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent casts and stacking up to 3 times. While Sylas has stacks, he gains  125% bonus attack speed.
markedPassages: 125% bonus attack speed
125% bonus attack speed

1.text: Unshackled: Sylas' next basic attack is empowered to consume a stack to whirl his chains around him, which has an  uncancellable windup and deals 130% AD (+ 25% AP) magic damage to the primary target and 40% AD (+ 20% AP) magic damage to nearby enemies.
1.html: Unshackled: Sylas' next basic attack is empowered to consume a stack to whirl his chains around him, which has an uncancellable windup and deals 130% AD (+ 25% AP) magic damage to the primary target and 40% AD (+ 20% AP) magic damage to nearby enemies.
markedPassages: uncancellable windup

2.text: Damage to secondary targets executes  minions that would be left below  25 health.
2.html: Damage to secondary targets executes minions that would be left below  25 health.
markedPassages: minions
25 health

3.text: The empowered attack applies on-hit effects only to the primary target but disables the bonus damage from  critical strikes. Ability effects only apply to secondary targets.
3.html: The empowered attack applies on-hit effects only to the primary target but disables the bonus damage from critical strikes. Ability effects only apply to secondary targets.
markedPassages: critical strikes
possibleConcerningAbilities: The empowered attack applies on-hit effects only to the primary target but disables the bonus damage from  critical strikes. Ability effects only apply to secondary targets.

0.text: COST: 55 MANA
Active: Sylas lashes out two chains that converge to the target location and extend beyond it up to a maximum range, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and  slowing them for 1.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Sylas lashes out two chains that converge to the target location and extend beyond it up to a maximum range, dealing magic damage to enemies hit and slowing them for 1.5 seconds.
markedPassages: slowing

1.text: After a 0.6-second delay, the chains' intersection explodes to deal magic damage to enemies within, reduced by 60% against  minions and  monsters.
1.html: After a 0.6-second delay, the chains' intersection explodes to deal magic damage to enemies within, reduced by 60% against minions and monsters.
markedPassages: minions
monsters

2.text: Chain Lash will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: Chain Lash will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
possibleConcerningAbilities: Chain Lash will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Sylas  dashes to the front of the target enemy's location then strikes them to deal magic damage.
0.html: Active: Sylas dashes to the front of the target enemy's location then strikes them to deal magic damage.
markedPassages: dashes

1.text: If this damages a  champion, Sylas is also  healed, increased by 0% − 100% (based on his missing health).
1.html: If this damages a champion, Sylas is also healed, increased by 0% − 100% (based on his missing health).

0.text: 0% − 100% (based on his missing health)

markedPassages: champion
healed
0% − 100% (based on his missing health)

0.text: COST: 65 MANA
Active: Sylas  dashes to the target location. Within 3.5 seconds, he can cast  Abduct after a 0.2-second delay from casting Abscond.
0.html: Active: Sylas dashes to the target location. Within 3.5 seconds, he can cast Abduct after a 0.2-second delay from casting Abscond.
markedPassages: dashes
Abduct

1.text: Kingslayer can be cast during the dash. Abscond will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
1.html: Kingslayer can be cast during the dash. Abscond will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
markedPassages: Kingslayer
possibleConcerningAbilities: Kingslayer can be cast during the dash. Abscond will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: CAST TIME: 0.25

Active: Sylas whips out his chains in the target direction that deal magic damage to the first enemy hit and  reveal and  stun them for 0.5 seconds. Upon hitting the target, Sylas  dashes to their location and  knocks them up for 0.5 seconds upon arrival.
0.html: Active: Sylas whips out his chains in the target direction that deal magic damage to the first enemy hit and reveal and stun them for 0.5 seconds. Upon hitting the target, Sylas dashes to their location and knocks them up for 0.5 seconds upon arrival.
markedPassages: reveal
stun
dashes
knocks them up

1.text: Sylas is  unable to cast  Chain Lash while the chains are in flight.
1.html: Sylas is unable to cast Chain Lash while the chains are in flight.
markedPassages: unable
Chain Lash
possibleConcerningAbilities: Sylas is  unable to cast  Chain Lash while the chains are in flight.

0.text: COST: 75 MANA

5.text: ON-TARGET COOLDOWN: 200% OF TARGET'S ULTIMATE COOLDOWN

0.text: Active: Sylas launches his chains at the target enemy champion, gaining a copy of their ultimate ability and  revealing them for 0.825 seconds at the start of the cast time. Sylas cannot select the same champion again for a set duration, and can hold the hijacked ultimate for up to 90 seconds, during which he can recast Hijack.
0.html: Active: Sylas launches his chains at the target enemy champion, gaining a copy of their ultimate ability and revealing them for 0.825 seconds at the start of the cast time. Sylas cannot select the same champion again for a set duration, and can hold the hijacked ultimate for up to 90 seconds, during which he can recast Hijack.
markedPassages: revealing

1.text: Recast: Sylas casts his hijacked ultimate ability at no cost, scaling based on Hijack's rank and his own statistics.
1.html: Recast: Sylas casts his hijacked ultimate ability at no cost, scaling based on Hijack's rank and his own statistics.

2.text: Hijacked ultimates and abilities that do not scale with  ability power have their  attack damage ratios converted to ability power ratios, scaling with 0.6% AP per 1% total AD, and 0.4% AP per 1% bonus AD respectively.
2.html: Hijacked ultimates and abilities that do not scale with  ability power have their  attack damage ratios converted to ability power ratios, scaling with 0.6% AP per 1% total AD, and 0.4% AP per 1% bonus AD respectively.
